vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 28, “Motor Vehicles and Traffic,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Sections 28-44, 28-50, 28-60, and 28-81.1 to (1) designating speed regulations on streets other than expressways; (2) designating school traffic zones; (3) providing bike lanes as a prohibited place to stop, stand, or park; (4) providing a penalty not to exceed $200.00; (5) providing a saving clause; (6) providing a severability clause; and (7) providing an effective date - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
